foreignData.name: Phalanx des Konklave
foreignData.text:
Einberufen (Jede Kreatur, die du tappst, während du diesen Zauberspruch spielst, reduziert dessen Kosten um {1} oder um ein Mana der Farbe jener Kreatur.)
Wenn die Phalanx des Konklave ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.name: Falange del Cónclave
foreignData.text:
Convocar (Cada criatura que gires al jugar este hechizo reduce su coste en {1} o en un maná del color de esa criatura.)
Cuando la Falange del Cónclave entre en juego, ganas 1 vida por cada criatura que controles.

foreignData.name: Phalange du Conclave
foreignData.text:
Convocation (Chaque créature que vous engagez en jouant ce sort réduit son coût de {1} ou d'un mana de la couleur de cette créature.)
Quand la Phalange du Conclave arrive en jeu, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.name: Falange del Conclave
foreignData.text:
Convocazione (Ciascuna creatura che TAPpi mentre giochi questa magia riduce il suo costo di {1} o di un mana del colore di quella creatura.)
Quando la Falange del Conclave entra in gioco, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni creatura che controlli.

foreignData.name: 議事会の密集軍
foreignData.text:
召集 （あなたがこの呪文をプレイする段階であなたがタップした各クリーチャーにつき、この呪文のコストはそのクリーチャーの色のマナ１点か{1}少なくなる。）
議事会の密集軍が場に出たとき、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.name: Falange do Conclave
foreignData.text:
Convocar (Cada criatura que você vira ao jogar esta mágica reduz seu custo em {1} ou em um mana da cor daquela criatura.)
Quando Falange do Conclave entra em jogo, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura que você controla.

foreignData.name: Фаланга Конклава
foreignData.text:
Созыв (Когда вы разыгрываете это заклинание, каждое повернутое существо уменьшает стоимость заклинания на {1} или на один пункт маны цвета этого существа).
Когда Фаланга Конклава вступает в игру, вы получаете 1 пункт жизни за каждое существо, которое вы контролируете.

foreignData.name: 盟会方阵兵团
foreignData.text:
召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）
当盟会方阵兵团进场时，你每操控一个生物，便获得1点生命。

name: Conclave Phalanx
originalText:
Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Phalanx comes into play, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

rulings.text: The rules for convoke have changed slightly since it last appeared in an expansion. Previously, convoke reduced the cost to cast a spell. Under current rules, you tap creatures at the same time you pay the spell’s costs. Tapping a creature this way is simply another way to pay.
Convoke doesn’t change a spell’s mana cost or converted mana cost.

When calculating a spell’s total cost, include any alternative costs, additional costs, or anything else that increases or reduces the cost to cast the spell. Convoke applies after the total cost is calculated.
Because convoke isn’t an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs.
Tapping a multicolored creature using convoke will pay for {1} or one mana of your choice of any of that creature’s colors.

When using convoke to cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost, first choose the value for X. That choice, plus any cost increases or decreases, will determine the spell’s total cost. Then you can tap creatures you control to help pay that cost. For example, if you cast Chord of Calling (a spell with convoke and mana cost {X}{G}{G}{G}) and choose X to be 3, the total cost is {3}{G}{G}{G}. If you tap two green creatures and two red creatures, you’ll have to pay {1}{G}.

If a creature you control has a mana ability with {T} in the cost, activating that ability while casting a spell with convoke will result in the creature being tapped when you pay the spell’s costs. You won’t be able to tap it again for convoke. Similarly, if you sacrifice a creature to activate a mana ability while casting a spell with convoke, that creature won’t be on the battlefield when you pay the spell’s costs, so you won’t be able to tap it for convoke.

text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
